description: Styles for the Kavia button component, including multiple button variants and responsive design adjustments based on themes.

classes.name: kavia-btn
classes.description: Base styles for the Kavia button, including layout, padding, and appearance settings.

classes.name: btn-primary
classes.description: Styles for the primary button variant with specific background and text colors.

classes.name: btn-secondary
classes.description: Styles for the secondary button variant with a different background color.

classes.name: btn-outline
classes.description: Styles for the outline button variant, which includes borders and background adjustments.

classes.name: btn-sm
classes.description: Small size variant of the button with adjusted padding and font size.

classes.name: btn-md
classes.description: Medium size variant of the button with adjusted padding and font size.

classes.name: btn-lg
classes.description: Large size variant of the button with adjusted padding and font size.

classes.name: btn-disabled
classes.description: Styles for disabled buttons, indicating they are not clickable.

classes.name: btn-fullwidth
classes.description: Makes the button take the full width of its container.

classes.name: btn-icon
classes.description: Styles for buttons containing icons, allowing alignment of icon and text.
